name: Twice A000007.
comment: Also decimal expansion of 1/5, with keyword cons. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jan 19 2023

link: James Spahlinger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000

program: a000038 n = 2 * a000007 n -- _James Spahlinger_, Oct 08 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
